entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
